page.title: 09West Bromwich Today
page.content: West Bromwich has 'good grounds' meaning that with a popular park,West Bromwich town centre and local cinema,there can hardly come a time when you can say that there is no where to go.These places are great to go in mornings or afternoons but in the evenings most of the places close except for the parks,which parents tell you are "too dangerous" when it is dark.So where do you go? Churches and chapels sometimes hold various kinds of clubs one or two nights a week.Schools and nurseries are evenly spread out, so children are occupied most of the day.But what does the older generation do? Look after family or spend the evening in a pub.Unemployment is high with little work available to keep these people off the streets. Stephanie Jukes 14
